knimeNode.name: GATKSelectVariants
knimeNode.shortDescription: Select a subset of variants from a larger callset.

fullDescription.intro:
This node is based on the SelectVariants tool of GATK. It can be used for selecting subsets of variants from a VCF containing many samples and/or variants.
For further information, see GATK documentation of SelectVariants.

tab.name: Options
tab.option: Select the variant type (SNP or indel) which should be in the resulting subset file.

tab.name: GATK
tab.option: Set the maximum Java heap size (in GB).

You can check this option to perform the analysis in certain genomic regions. You have to specify the intervals in a text file in BED format (Format explained at http://genome.ucsc.edu/FAQ/FAQformat.html) and select the file in the file browser.
Set additional command line flags for the GATKSelectVariants.

tab.name: Preference page
tab.option: Set a threshold for repeated execution. Only used if HTE is enabled in the preference page.
Set the path to the reference reference sequence. This will be done automatically if the path is already defined in the preference page.
Set the path to GenomeAnalysisTK.jar. This will be done automatically if the path is already defined in the preference page.

ports.inPort: Cell [1..x]: Path to VCF input file Exact column can be selected by using the node parameters
ports.outPort: Cell 0: Path to a subset VCF file containing SNPs or indels

views.view: The node offers a direct view of its standard out and the standard error of the tool.
